select from strategy_acl
and name like CONCAT('%', #{search,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and name like CONCAT('%', #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and source_ip like CONCAT('%', #{sourceIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and source_port like CONCAT('%', #{sourcePort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and destination_ip like CONCAT('%', #{destinationIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and destination_port like CONCAT('%', #{destinationPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and proto_type = #{protoType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and exec_action = #{execAction,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and work_state = #{workState,jdbcType=TINYINT}
order by gmt_create desc, id desc
